column1: polandine kurich oraksharam nee mindaruth ath enikk estamalla
pettannu theerthal adutha pani udane tharam
njammal constable alle ningal aapisar ingal thanne nannaki kolinn
chilappol kutti vedi undakale neritendi varum appol virimaru kanich kodukkendi varum
